text: Colin George Pratt (10 October 1938 â€“ 2 October 2021)Oakes, P.(2006). Speedway Star Almanac. Colin Pratt was a British motorcycle speedway rider. He was a promoter of the Coventry Bees who competed in the British Elite League. He qualified for the final of the Speedway World Championship in 1967.Bamford, R. & Shailes, G. (2002). A History of the World Speedway Championship. Stroud: Tempus Publishing. It was as a Hackney rider that he won the London Riders' Championship in 1967 and again in 1968. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British racecar drivers Category:Sportspeople from Hertfordshire
title: Colin Pratt
